It's garnished with parsley and sits on a white napkin, accompanied by a small side of coleslaw.	<>	The lobster roll sandwich features a buttery toasted bun, rich lobster meat, creamy mayonnaise, chopped celery, and fresh parsley, all served in a foil container with a plastic fork.	<>	The lobster roll sandwich is made with lobster meat, mayonnaise, and lettuce, served on a toasted bun. It's garnished with chopped parsley and placed in a foil container with a side of coleslaw, ready to eat.	<>	The lobster roll sandwich is made with a split hot dog bun, filled with chunks of lobster meat, shredded lettuce, and a generous amount of mayonnaise-based sauce, garnished with finely chopped parsley. It's served in a disposable aluminum foil container with a plastic fork, and the sandwich is topped with a translucent plastic container of coleslaw.
/food-101/images/lobster_roll_sandwich/816323.jpg			A lobster roll sandwich, featuring fresh lobster meat, creamy mayonnaise, and herbs, served in a soft, toasted bun, with a side of rice pilaf and garnished with lemon and lettuce.	<>	The lobster roll sandwich features a buttery bun, creamy lobster salad with herbs, and a side of brown rice pilaf, all served with a side of fresh greens and a lemon wedge, cooked by steaming or boiling the lobster, and assembled fresh.	<>	A lobster roll sandwich features fresh lobster meat mixed with mayonnaise, herbs, and spices, served in a toasted split-top bun, accompanied by a side of rice pilaf. It's a classic seafood dish with a creamy, savory filling and a buttery bun, often garnished with lettuce and a lemon wedge.	<>	Lobster Roll Sandwich: A delectable creation featuring freshly shucked lobster meat, creamy mayonnaise, and fresh herbs, served in a soft, buttery bread roll, accompanied by a side of saut√©ed rice and vibrant green lettuce, creating a visually appealing and mouth-watering meal.	<>	The lobster roll sandwich features lobster meat, herbs, and mayonnaise, served in a toasted bun with sides of green salad and garlic rice, all presented on a white plate with a golden crust on the bun and vibrant red lobster meat.
